The family of 3 face difficulties furnishing their new rental unit due to medical crisis and income inadequacy and instability. 

Client is certified permanently disabled due to stroke and has been admitted after a fall last week. Client's son (M25) has been managing housing and discharge care matters while serving National Service. Client's daughter (F19) works ad-hoc jobs to juggle caregiving needs and supplement income. 

Family needs a dryer to keep up with caregiving demands.

name: Oven
description:
Client is a single mother and a sole caregiver to her 6-year-old daughter. She has been struggling with ongoing health issues, which required her to take hospital leave. She is unable to engage in physically demanding work, severely impacting her ability to secure stable employment.
 
She has been running a small home-based baking business on the side, unfortunately her oven has broken down. With no current employment and increasing financial stress, she would greatly benefit from a donor’s support in obtaining a new oven. This would allow her to restart her baking business, relieve some of her financial stressors, and continue providing for her daughter.
 
Client is looking for a 35L oven to replace her current oven.

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre – Hougang and Buangkok
contact.name: Odelia Tan

name: Blood Pressure Monitor
description:
Client is a 50-year-old female divorcee with three children. Her eldest daughter is married and has her own financial challenges. Her second daughter, 26 years old, is struggling with mental health conditions and client is her main caregiver. Her youngest son is still schooling in university.

Client suffers from chronic leg pain. Because of her chronic leg pain and full-time caregiving responsibilities to her second daughter, she is unable to gain employment. Client was recently informed by doctor about her possible high blood pressure and was advised to have regular measurements at home for monitoring. However, client experiences financial difficulties in getting a blood pressure monitor.

If you are keen to support/donate a blood pressure monitor to client, please WhatsApp me at 9654 7067.

Thank you in advance for the kind support.

contact.org: Home Nursing Foundation
contact.name: Loo Jia Ling
